bibl.title: On the Melitians in P. London VI (P. Jews) 1914: The Problem of Papas Heraiscus.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology
bibl.author: Hauben, Hans

bibl.note: Papas Heraiscus was indeed the Melitian bishop of Alexandria. This fact enables us to eliminate several other uncertainties regarding the Melitian schism.
Hauben Hans, On the Melitians in P. London VI (P. Jews) 1914: The Problem of Papas Heraiscus.
Proceedings of the Sixteenth International Congress of Papyrology (Chico, 1981) pp. 447-456.
